column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Apparently, highly flammable fuel sources and exploding monsters are a bad combination.
Survey the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
Where's a hunter when you need one?
Oh, hey there. Say, you seem like the wild critter-wrangling type. What do you say to a little honest work?
You see, down by the ceruleum pits, we've got ourselves something of an infestation. Cerule bombs, to be precise.
Now, with them being the flame-spewing, explode-at-the-drop-of-a-hat sons of salamanders that they are, if even one got into our fuel supplies, this whole place would be blown sky-high!

Until recently, I've always had a hunter friend of mine keep their numbers down, but he's, ah...temporarily incapacitated. I was thinking you could take his place. If so, there's a whole bunch of them a little ways south from here. Good hunting!
If you're having trouble finding them, just wait by one of the ceruleum pits, and they're sure to find <Emphasis>you</Emphasis>!
All done? How many were there?
Are you kidding? They must've invited every damn bomb and his cousin to join the party! Sounds like you got there just in time.
Of course, culling them the old-fashioned way's risky work, and it ain't easy finding someone with the necessary skills. I guess we'd better come up with a better plan to keep them at bay.
In any case, you've done us all a good turn, friend. I just knew I'd picked the right <If(PlayerParameter(4))>gal<Else/>guy</If> for the job!
